children.text: Loop through the inventory boxes until we find one that is empty, set it's HasValue to true and create the inventory item in the box. The parameter tells us which object to create.
Loop through the inventory items until we find one that is touching an InventoryBox but has no CurrentInvSlot number, set the number.
Loop through inventory items until we find one that is touching an InventoryBox and that box number matches the parameter. Destroy the object.

parameters.text: "OI! WHERE DO YOU THINK YOU ARE GOING?"
